thread.section_title: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® | custombuttons.com
thread.title: Jeffrey Thomas
thread.title_full: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® reviewed by Jeffrey Thomas

author: Jeffrey Thomas
title: Jeffrey Thomas
text: I started off with an idea of making something special for a team my wife coaches. I contacted Everyone Loves Buttons to see if they where able to make what I had dreamed up in my mind. They quickly responded and informed me they would work with me to make whatever I wanted. After going through a few proofs and some very thoughtful design changes from their staff I had the perfect design and quickly transformed it into the perfict button. Thank you for your excellent service and I'm looking forward to working with you in the future.
